about_the_game:
PRESENTATION


This is a 2D RPG in the style of Vagrant Hearts and Fantasy Heroes.

As a spellcaster living in a remote island, Talia has always led a private life... for more than just her personality.
Her daugther, Lydia, is the object of a powerful secret that could doom the whole kingdom. Once that secret comes to life, Talia and Lydia will have to fight against an evil they didn't even know existed.

Embark on a journey through a kingdom ravaged by plague, greed and magic. You are the only who can bring about their salvation, and yours also depends on your success in that task.

FEATURES


  • An emotional storyline that will keep engaged from start to finish
  • Different islands with different cultures, environments and enemies to explore and conquer
  • Beautiful artwork that gives life to the characters
  • Quest Journal to keep track of your progress
  • Mouse Support
  • 15 to 20 hours of gameplay
